timeline.bodyText: I would suggest to not add code which is commented out. If it is absolutely necessary please add also some description with reason why is this code commented out.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
@jiripetrlik
Sorry, forgot that. I'm going to review that class to see if it is needed at all.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText: Is this really necessary? I would guess that nobody will try to initiate class with constants and if so it will not cause any damage.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
@jiripetrlik
All those "private" constructor are due to some SONAR complaints.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: Again. Is this necessary? Instantiation will not cause any harm to the app.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: Seems a little bit suspicious. Do we really want to always return null here? Don't we forget to add implementation?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
@jiripetrlik
This model is used only to test the ModelImplementationProvider  without any actual model implementation: does this makes sense ?
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: One idea. What about to use Assertj in the future. It provides much more rich asserts and also messages about failures are much more verbose.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
@jiripetrlik
TBH, I never had the need of using it - so probably what it adds has never been essential for me;  org.junit.Assert also seems more consistent with most of the code I saw inside drools. So, I would prefer to keep it as it is unless I find a need.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: Would it be possible to split this stream into multiple steps? I personally don't like such long streams because it is usually very poorly readable and it is hard to figure out what is happening.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: We can add some warning into logs. Something like "Validation was skipped because of backward compatibility".
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: Again either uncomment or remove this code.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik
jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand what is going on here.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
@jiripetrlik
All those tests are a left-over of previous implementation. I'm going to rewrite needed ones
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add javadoc and add prefix Abstract?
timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible? What about an exception or at least a log?
timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca
danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
Done with a slight refactoring: getting rid of  Optionals and thrown Exceptions
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure this could happen? We are working with a template created by us
timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
Is not used inside ClassificationTable; but since this latter extends RegressionTable, I kept empty implementation in ClassificationTable and changed to abstract in RegressionTable
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: I think it is more clear to have KiePMMLSourceCode and KiePMMLByteCode to clarify when they are used
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.message: [DROOLS-3339] Missing bits. Completely remove use of optionals in factories
[DROOLS-4933] Refactor module layout to include KiePMMLRuntime implementation
[DROOLS-4933] Implemented compiler and assembler, with tests
[DROOLS-4933] Switched version. Moved ResourceHelper to kie-test-util package
[DROOLS-4933] Implemented integration test module. Full roundtrip test for linear regression
[DROOLS-4933] Implementing full roundtrip test with full kie integration - test not working
[DROOLS-4933] Implementing PMMLWeaverService. Fixing integration test setup
[DROOLS-4933] Begin implementation of drools-based Tree model
[DROOLS-4933] Begin implementation of Tree model with tests
[DROOLS-4933] Keep going with implementation of Tree model and tests
[DROOLS-4933] Renaming previous implementation to kie-pmml-legacy. Updating dependant modules to reflect that
[DROOLS-4933] Fixing linear regression roundtrip test. Implementing finder
[DROOLS-4933] Commenting execution logic from Tree model. Begin model test implementation
[DROOLS-4933] Done TreeModelImplementationProviderTest stub. Add True/False predicates.
[DROOLS-4933] First TreeModel (drools) iteration done with empty rule
[DROOLS-4933] TreeModel (drools) iteration done with golfing model example test
[DROOLS-4933] Refactored log. Keep working on mining model.
[DROOLS-4933] Add Tree model overall implementation strategy description
[DROOLS-4933] Add test utility methods. Fixed pom
[DROOLS-3339] Begin refactoring of regression model with new architecture
[DROOLS-4933] Add assertions to tests inside kie-test-util
[DROOLS-3339] Add tests to IsRegressionModel. Make KiePMMLRegressionModel constructor protected
[DROOLS-3339] Add some fixes as per sonar suggestion
